artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Sakanaya Eikichi
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 250, vertical ōban #62.15
description: figures on path in middle bottom, including horse with packages on its back; blue and white umbrella, LLC; buildings at right; trees at left center; flying birds at top center
inscription: URC, LLC and right edge, LRQ, in black: untranslated inscriptions
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From One Hundred Famous Views of Edo (Meisho Edo hyakkei 名所江戸百景)
provenance: Unknown when/where Harry Drake purchased, possibly Thomas French Fine Art
title: Ueno Yamashita
